settings.subheading-column2: THIS MULTIPURPOSE SPRAY GIVES YOU MANYDIFFERENT STYLES ALL IN ONE BOTTLE.
settings.rich-text:
With one single bottle, you can style your hair in seconds, achieve flexibility, and double the lifespan of your current product(s).

At only 8.8 oz., Filoso Sea Salt Spray lasts an average of 9-12 months with daily use.Â 

To apply it, simply spray 5-7 times onto your hair or into your hands to create a natural textured finish, instantly giving you the feeling of confidence and satisfaction.

Try it today, and see what Filoso Sea Salt Spray can do for you.
